title: Improve "quantification" of axes in Collaborative Technology production possibilities frontier
description: In the Collaborative Technology and Democracy chapter, it would be helpful to partially and roughly "quantify" the axes on the production possibilities frontier diagram, adding also a discussion.  The vertical axis can roughly reference the richness of information associated to each participant (scalar, vector, semi-structured text, natural language, single sense, multisensory, proprioception, telepathy) and the horizontal can roughly index the number of randomly chosen full participant human equivalents in orders of magnitude from just a few to billions and beyond.
